name: client-code-gen
description: OpenAPI Generation for API Client Code

scripts.dockergen-app-access-control-api-bash: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v7.0.1 generate -i local/app-access-control-openapi.json -g typescript-axios --config local/api.json -o /local/gen/app-access-control-api
scripts.dockergen-admin-management-api-bash: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v7.0.1 generate -i local/admin-management-openapi.json -g typescript-axios --config local/api.json -o /local/gen/admin-management-api
scripts.dockergen-api-bash: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v7.0.1 generate -i local/openapi.json -g typescript-axios --config local/api.json -o /local/gen
scripts.dockergen-api-win: docker run --rm -v %cd%:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v7.0.1 generate -i local/openapi.json -g typescript-axios --config local/api.json -o local/gen
scripts.gen-api: rm -rf gen && openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi.json --generator-name typescript-axios -o gen --config api.json
